publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3730 University Rector’s Torture Evidence (lodged on 18 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*

S3M-3730 Bill Wilson: University Rector’s Torture Evidence—That the Parliament supports the request by the rector of the University of Dundee, Craig Murray, to give evidence to the Westminster Parliament’s Joint Committee on Human Rights on the subject of the UK Government’s policy on receiving intelligence obtained by torture abroad and considers that Mr Murray is offering first-hand eye-witness testimony with documentary proof of a secret and reprehensible policy of attempting to benefit from torture, endorsed and directed by UK ministers. Supported by: Robin Harper, Christopher Harvie, Christina McKelvie, Stuart McMillan, Joe FitzPatrick, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Sandra White
